適應症: 發育不良、營養補給、虛弱體質、熱性消耗性疾患之補助治療、妊娠婦之營養補給
主成分略述: FERROUS (SULFATE), MANGANESE (SULFATE), PHOSPHOROUS (CALCIUM PHOSPHATE ANHYDROUS), CALCIUM (DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE ANHYDROUS), MAGNESIUM (SULFATE), POTASSIUM (SULFATE), VITAMIN A PALMITATE, NIACINAMIDE (NICOTINAMIDE), VITAMIN B1 (MONONITRATE), RIBOFLAVIN (VIT B2), PYRIDOXINE(VITAMIN B6), VITAMIN B12 (CYANOCOBALAMIN 1%), PANTOTHENATE D- CALCIUM, ASCORBIC ACID (VIT C), ERGOCALCIFEROL (VIT D2CALCIFEROL), TOCOPHEROL ACETATE ALPHA D-, LECITHIN(LECITHOL), ZINC (ZINC SULFATE)
